feed.title: autobrr Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for autobrr: v1.47.0
entry.content:
Changelog

New Features

  • ea25b6bb7fc77dd0a77fa6b111a3100324da3d90: feat(database): add missing filter indexes (#1712) (@KyleSanderson)
  • 737184a98584f43c8c06664e10d95f59971856ce: feat(downloads): handle http status 429 rate-limit retry (#1749) (@zze0s)
  • 009647fcd1e93b785c4ad7b28fbcad366f45bca6: feat(filters): sort by created and updated (#1751) (@martylukyy)
  • e9f8730ca011e6825eb06be34c62b0184a6e51bd: feat(filters): wildcard slice matching optimizations (#1716) (@KyleSanderson)
  • a4452e4fdc036479f4a04edd48c604ec1f7c1bab: feat(indexers): add LustHive (#1732) (@martylukyy)
  • e56bf1f8fcf9a1c24dd306ed4db4606fafd35db9: feat(notifications): Telegram set sender (#1723) (@martylukyy)
  • ec79eafe4336ae6e46457c14bb98a9ddc361be11: feat(notifications): optional Telegram sender (#1726) (@martylukyy)
  • 51265b67022121ee6b9122d8504cfe360a27c1c4: feat(releases): show indexer name in indexer filter (#1720) (@martylukyy)
  • caccaf3e0987db84bcf7280de90e62d31251782b: feat(wildcard): fast-path some cases (#1747) (@KyleSanderson)

Bug fixes

  • c8e2fba3343597eb40c3cc1046bb318ea49e2525: fix(build): run web-dist tarball step for tags only (#1730) (@fabricionaweb)
  • 45df8a67ee76c27c691ba46ce0408cf160d32f01: fix(docs): update feature requests link and swizzin install link (#1729) (@martylukyy)
  • bf7e1381ac1201b2c6ce2dbeb626747d85d081b7: fix(downloadclients): arrs change size type to uint64 (#1744) (@zze0s)
  • e9726363b42a2640122a204b15d07a5ae7cb71b0: fix(downloadclients): do not load Deluge from cache (#1743) (@zze0s)
  • d15b61870eb01d8f8093e87a4b1e4c40ec71977c: fix(filters): release download counts (#1739) (@cascandaliato)
  • 490308c9c6ef6e4d1d79dd7df6d6166bf6dde8b0: fix(indexers): new baseURL for Fuzer (#1724) (@martylukyy)
  • ca2d956e0240846da2500e5da13196ad964c2148: fix(notifications): disable notification and events have no effect (#1754) (@zze0s)
  • e9cd6b00493f00a4ed75077daa4552679229501b: fix(sanitize): improve handling for newline tabs etc (#1733) (@KyleSanderson)
  • 3af06553e7612f126d3ea9355e9dcbf3cca1df1a: fix(web): activity/release table cell widths (#1717) (@martylukyy)
  • 425c3b21ef20b490c62e7cfa83eebd8b7c6e8a07: fix(web): form slideovers for mobile views (#1725) (@martylukyy)

Other work

  • 5e6c4b16c5b30323563adbdd30a6c6c91aedf436: build(deps): bump the golang group with 6 updates (#1748) (@dependabot[bot])
  • e7f25cbe3b09b133b599aecc2b96058455116a37: build: add web/dist tarball (#1721) (@fabricionaweb)
  • 1d68aec31e7509a7b0b1d25294a9f006b96a71f8: build: upload web-dist to release assets on tag (#1731) (@zze0s)
  • 91db3cfd0f7a516f8f166903c29b2cd910d179cd: chore(indexers): remove LilleSky (#1735) (@NLZ)

Full Changelog: https://github.com/autobrr/autobrr/compare/v1.46.1...v1.47.0

Docker images

  • docker pull ghcr.io/autobrr/autobrr:v1.47.0

What to do next?

  • Read the documentation
  • Join our Discord server

entry.title: New release for autobrr: v1.47.1
entry.content:
Changelog

Bug fixes

  • 5fec9ac1b290b0bece4dd88acfbbb8d58b13dfc3: fix(build): do not create flat tarball for web-dist (#1757) (@fabricionaweb)
  • a64fd779f82fb8c4512b6a68915dc921f0917c9c: fix(wildcard): check name length (#1758) (@KyleSanderson)

Other work

  • 00326d248613b6e77b3ec396d94394e5926b09b1: build(deps): bump autobrr/go-qbittorrent to v1.10.0 (#1760) (@zze0s)

Full Changelog: https://github.com/autobrr/autobrr/compare/v1.47.0...v1.47.1

Docker images

  • docker pull ghcr.io/autobrr/autobrr:v1.47.1

What to do next?

  • Read the documentation
  • Join our Discord server

entry.title: New release for autobrr: v1.48.0
entry.content:
Changelog

New Features

  • f029de233fa2489948d2b76d2db8fc0dfea8ea7f: feat(filters): improve rejection handling (#1776) (@zze0s)

Bug fixes

  • 2386a9db319e99184d329d6a71a21f04f4ef0397: fix(config): log reload message once (#1773) (@s0up4200)
  • f7e635d5ae6c4db89d88aa11bfacfc88cb576e67: fix(indexers): OPS API test function (#1772) (@s0up4200)
  • 636129f282833be0e518ce4313bc5f50fb502950: fix(indexers): PTP API test function (#1771) (@s0up4200)
  • 509e4ddaeddf3dc42a3926761a10addcee2c489a: fix(indexers): update Fuzer IRC addr (#1764) (@martylukyy)
  • 04ffb0b39d89398dd5870379dc570338e7d979ad: fix(web): remove unnecessary link to Logs (#1774) (@s0up4200)
  • 5df6e78d3b8b2182fc7b53597e35b06d6234afe4: fix(wildcard): partial match ignoring consumed pattern (#1765) (@KyleSanderson)

Other work

  • 7e5f65fd6ee6412195c6d55dccde11d8b1fde6b4: chore(build): update workflows and go.mod to use latest patch version of Go (#1775) (@s0up4200)
  • ae779e546122c0c5b304793e82a21bca6d26e743: feat(download-client): add label to Deluge if it does not exist (#1761) (@KyokoMiki)

Full Changelog: https://github.com/autobrr/autobrr/compare/v1.47.1...v1.48.0

Docker images

  • docker pull ghcr.io/autobrr/autobrr:v1.48.0

What to do next?

  • Read the documentation
  • Join our Discord server

entry.title: New release for autobrr: v1.49.0
entry.content:
Changelog

New Features

  • 50e0e419e039914c6b2085346fbb93e1fb0354f1: feat(actions): rename skip reannounce to disable reannounce (#1794) (@zze0s)
  • f89ea9e2ff1b14e44478f6561e31df31ece17ca8: feat(filters): sanitize description (#1781) (@KyleSanderson)
  • a003f68f92d27dffcc86361808511042a49ece30: feat(http): set ResponseHeaderTimeout (#1777) (@KyleSanderson)
  • 13113907b23a806987c0920cf06c6dc7ba335710: feat(indexers): DigitalCore parse Tags and Genre (#1790) (@s0up4200)

Bug fixes

  • d23e7ffca69684b64745c7b3bdab8dcbd61e6d4d: fix(downloads): handle panic in error check (#1782) (@zze0s)
  • 8f2398a627d70759039331bec41d7c71d28a6b26: fix(filters): lint warning variable naming (#1783) (@zze0s)
  • 63b8519bd9da5d9f7e3e7aad6e3611049c1f083a: fix(filters): trim user input (#1784) (@zze0s)
  • 70dc2cb6c079e0ff9fb58f7966d2d72200a53ec6: fix(indexer): update suggested nick format for FearNoPeer IRC (#1788) (@s0up4200)
  • f4c2aef38c6e8b0c3a5823135f544a7ffbf63533: fix(indexers): BTFiles size parsing (#1805) (@KyleSanderson)
  • 40fe3e9f54d8b0f526c0d79d826737d61acdf91d: fix(indexers): delete feed with indexer (#1810) (@zze0s)
  • 41216babe6c4679cbc73384a1abc0dec1b87d0c7: fix(proxy): add shared transport for proxies (#1808) (@zze0s)
  • 59c5858bf08b483867bba98746b819539ef45fff: fix(releases): update size after actions run (#1809) (@zze0s)
  • 594393eaaf05a80333b30c013e4c249358df1596: fix(wildcard): improve short word matching (#1806) (@KyleSanderson)
  • 8cd7d67cee3b2087b7cf4d3df8a23cd7d9f1713f: fix(wildcard): match on multi-line data (#1780) (@zze0s)

Other work

  • 1e76f33e47252d26e4fd2486e386ea14ea619e01: build(deps): bump the golang group with 2 updates (#1798) (@dependabot[bot])
  • 4ba380b8ea2839eea8b3b867bfe48fb8b0e4c048: build(deps): bump the npm group in /web with 23 updates (#1750) (@dependabot[bot])
  • b4f0d60b9bbacebd862653a5e12ce96d4c6949a5: chore: add missing license headers (#1811) (@s0up4200)

Full Changelog: https://github.com/autobrr/autobrr/compare/v1.48.0...v1.49.0

Docker images

  • docker pull ghcr.io/autobrr/autobrr:v1.49.0

What to do next?

  • Read the documentation
  • Join our Discord server
